title: Struggle
description: New Adult Contemporary Romance.Eva Clark has seen a lot in her 22 years. While running from her bruised past, she meets Nathan Brown...IT guy by day; hot, tattooed kick boxer by night. With his rock solid body, deep male voice, and dark brown eyes, Nathan is both irresistible and impenetrable.The more Eva tries to get close to Nathan, more he tries to push her away. What secrets is Nathan hiding from Eva? Can true love be resisted?Recommended Reading Age 18+Word Count : 38,000 Approximate Page Count: 150
author: P.A.   Jones
